alert.note: Alert for Eastern Mineral; Western Mineral (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 23 at 11:49AM EST until February 25 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY MORNING THROUGH FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Significant freezing rain accumulations possible. Total ice accumulations of up to three tenths of an inch possible. Snow and sleet accumulations less than one inch are also possible. * WHERE...In Maryland, Garrett and Allegany Counties. In West Virginia, Mineral County. * WHEN...From Thursday morning through Friday morning. * IMPACTS...Power outages and tree damage are possible due to the ice. Travel could be treacherous. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Precipitation may start as snow and sleet Thursday morning before becoming a prolonged period of freezing rain.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
